scripts.watch: mkdir -p ./cert ; echo "$TLS__INTERNAL__CRT" > ./cert/cert.pem & echo "$TLS__INTERNAL__KEY" > ./cert/key.pem & npx nodemon --watch core -e ts --exec ./trex start --tls 33000 -p 33001 --key ./cert/key.pem --cert ./cert/cert.pem --sql 5432 --main-service ./core/server --event-worker ./core/event --log-source --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229
scripts.build:trex: ENV_TYPE=local docker compose --file ../../docker-compose.yml --file ../../docker-compose-atlas.yml --file ../../docker-compose-local.yml --file docker-compose.yml --env-file ../../.env.local build trex
scripts.watchtest: RUST_LOG=info RUST_BACKTRACE=full npx nodemon --watch test -e ts --exec ./target/debug/trex start --main-service ./test/main --event-worker ./test/event-manager --sql 25432
